name: Amos Chapman Odom
pob: Red Level, Covington, Alabama, United States
bio: When Amos Chapman Odom was born on 2 August 1889, in Red Level, Covington, Alabama, United States, his father, James Richard Odom, was 35 and his mother, Susan Ware Moses, was 33. He married Amanda Soubeana Lee on 24 April 1910, in Brooks, Covington, Alabama, United States. They were the parents of at least 3 sons and 4 daughters. He lived in Oaky Streak, Butler, Alabama, United States for about 10 years and Election Precinct 2 Shell, Butler, Alabama, United States in 1940. He died on 15 January 1970, in Butler, Alabama, United States, at the age of 80, and was buried in Kervin Cemetery, Red Level, Covington, Alabama, United States.
